column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Being a Chicago native
column2: this place is one of my faves and must-go places when I'm back in town.  Living on the East Coast
column3: I miss the Chicago flavor and heartiness that represents my city!  The chocolate chip cookie dessert is right on point after a delicious pizza.  And no
column4: when I come back to Chicago
column5: my diet is on splurge-mode so you won't here me concerned about calories.
